body:
$AAPL Key News Update 
Apple workers at New York's Grand Central store take steps to unionize 
https://www.cnbc.com/2022/04/18/apple-workers-at-new-yorks-grand-central-store-take-steps-to-unionize.html

links.title: Apple workers at New York's Grand Central store take steps to unionize
links.description: Workers at Apple's flagship Grand Central Terminal retail store in New York City are taking steps to unionize, teeing up a potential labor battle with the iPhone maker. Organizers, who have dubbed themselves Fruit Stand Workers United, are in the process of collecting signatures from workers, according to FSWU's website.

body: $AAPL The communist lock downs have nothing to do with Covid.  It's deliberate to hurt the U.S.  Apple is going to feel it hard with Foxconn.  This is what happens when you sell your corporate soul to Lucifer.

$AAPL This has dropped $14 in 14 days.
Now we are 10 days to ER so time to go up. $179 for Pre ER.
$AAPL bullish or bearish for ER?

$NVDA $TSM $AMD $AAPL $TSLA 

https://www.digitimes.com/news/a20220417VL200/china-lockdown-ict-manufacturing.html

links.title: Ongoing lockdowns in China threaten disruptions in global electronics supply chain
links.description: Lockdowns underway in China to control the spread of COVID-19 are raising the specter of significant disruptions in the global supply chain for electronic components and consumer electronics, according to Omdia. Major cities in China are implementing restrictive measures to halt the spread of COVID-19 under the country's "zero COVID-19" policy.
